date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output:
  rmdformats::material:
    highlight: kate
  includes:
    after_body: footer.html
    before_body: header.html
---


```{r knitr_init, echo=FALSE, cache=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)

## Global options
options(max.print="75")
opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE,
	             cache=TRUE,
               prompt=FALSE,
               tidy=TRUE,
               comment=NA,
               message=FALSE,
               warning=FALSE)
opts_knit$set(width=75)
templateFile <- "material"
```
